attributes.action: send all the imigrants home so the brits can work!!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i believe that there are too many imigrants in the U.K taking all our jobs,
i have been unemployed for quite sometime and refuse to use tax payers money to keep me alive (the dole!!!) i along with all who sign thi wish for more jobs to be available to brits instead of polish, and slavackians working for £3 an hour. please people who feel the same sign this petition!!!!

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
